: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus Prime: Too unreliable. We have no way of insureing that something in the future might destroy our work before the council picks it up. Our best bet is to take a little time travel trip to earth, locate the council and get the matrix.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Yggdrasil: Of course, that used to be true, but the Survivor Council 
is on Earth, so they will have set up a comm array or joined to that 
of the Humans. I'll try to work on that.

Yggdrasil walked away and left the room, but Blackfang shook his 
head. He had a simpler idea.

Blackfang: Wait, we're on Earth too! Let's leave a message or a 
recording to the Survivor Council that they can pick up when they get 
on Earth in the Future!

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Assuming they could recieve a message from us. 
Optimus' last order before the Maximal government took over was to 
end all transformer contact with organic races. He felt that we had 
done them too much harm by bringing our war to them. At that time all 
transformers withdrew from earth and nebulos, all targetmaster, 
headmaster and powermaster technology was eliminated. I'm not sure 
anyone on earth is capable of hearing us. The only cybertronian 
things left on earth are the ruins of Autobot City and the Ark.
> 
> Rodimus remembers this time in history well. He had been very 
opposed to this course of action and had let Optimus know it. Rodimus 
had let his targetmaster be taken away and returned to Cybertron. 
However after the government change and the great upgrade Rodimus 
continued to serve with Maximals when most Autobots were retired.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang: I'll even greet him on his way out!
> 
> Yggdrasil: Rodimus, what if he doesn't know? Do you think that we 
> could send a message to Earth through a relay post in space?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > 
> > Rodimus Prime: It sure would. Now we wait for his cycle to 
complete.

wouldn't

choice
